job_title: Registered Nurse in East Meadow, NY

job_title: Registered Nurse in East Meadow, NY
pros: Only good thing I can say about NUMC is “most” of the people you work with are great and help you get through an otherwise horrible shift.  If it wasn’t for the anticipated pension at retirement there is no other reason to work here.. new graduates go somewhere else your benefit package stinks and you will be burnt out before you know it
cons: Management sucks, our NM has favorites and goes out of her way to help her friends the rest of the staff get BS and blatantly favors staff of her ethnicity, understaffed, underpaid, management does not care about nurses, Csea help only bad workers keep their job, no recognition for a job well done,  patients rooms are antiquated, equipment half the time broken or no where to be found,, unprofessional
